mapper.insert: insert into trainer values(null, #{id}, #{password},#{name}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{hp}, #{age}, null, null, null, null, null);
mapper.select: select count(id) from trainer where id=#{id}
select trainer_no trainerNo, id, password, name, address, gender, hp, age, career, saveName from trainer where trainer_no = #{trainerNo}
mapper.update: update trainer set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, hp = #{hp}, age = #{age} where trainer_no = #{trainerNo}
mapper.select: select t.name, t.saveName, count(p.pt_no) as totalMember, count(p.no) as trainerMember from trainer t left join pt p on t.trainer_no = p.trainer_no where t.trainer_no = #{trainerNo}
